what_you_do: I represent a revolutionary platform that empowers health and creates wealth by integrating cutting-edge DNA analysis, advanced technology, and artificial intelligence.
who_you_serve: Individuals passionate about health tech and entrepreneurship.
offering: Through this advanced platform, individuals can experience a new level of insight and control over their wellness journey. Not only is Project Helix reshaping personal health, but it also offers exciting opportunities for wealth creation.
business_focus: Transforming personal health with an innovative App that combines DNA and microbiome assessments, biometric wearable technology, IoT-connected devices, and mental and physical health assessments.
service_provided: DNA and microbiome assessments, biometric wearable technology, IoT-connected devices, mental and physical health assessments
